models.name: NWDAF — LSTM Autoencoder for Traffic Anomaly Detection
models.integration: 5GC / NWDAF (microservices); data from Control Plane; output local to analytics
models.use_case: Detect unusual UE traffic patterns to flag potential misuse/hijacking
models.role: Anomaly detection supporting security monitoring in NWDAF
models.nfs_consumers: Prototype only; not wired to downstream NFs (PoC)
models.data_input: Time‑series: timestamp, pduseid, value_ul, value_dl, value_total
models.validation: Correct anomaly classification; minimize false negatives
